subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: The Circuit de Catalunya, set in rolling hills not far from the Mediterranean coast and 30 kilometers from Barcelona, is a favorite track among most of the Formula One drivers. It is also a favorite for the engineers and technicians who develop the racing cars.
